definitions.text: the outside boundary or surface of something
a part of the city far removed from the center
examples: they built a factory on the outskirts of the city

definitions.text: one of the light or dark bands produced by the interference and diffraction of light
a social group holding marginal or extreme views
examples: members of the fringe believe we should be armed with guns at all times

definitions.text: a border of hair that is cut short and hangs across the forehead
an ornamental border consisting of short lengths of hanging threads or tassels
decorate with or as if with a surrounding fringe
examples: fur fringed the hem of the dress
